rust_corridor.name: The Rust Corridor
rust_corridor.description: Great Lakes industrial belt — Detroit to Pittsburgh. Rusted factories, salvage economies, flickering power grids.
rust_corridor.character: Smoke stacks and empty assembly lines. The Lattice keeps what power remains flowing, while the Syndicate picks through the bones.

appalachian_hollows.name: The Appalachian Hollows
appalachian_hollows.description: Mountain communities that survived by going dark. Hidden valleys, coal towns turned communes.
appalachian_hollows.character: Fog-shrouded ridges and settlements that don't appear on any map. The Ember Colonies endure here, alongside Cultivators tending terraced farms.

gulf_passage.name: The Gulf Passage
gulf_passage.description: Coastal trade routes from Texas to Florida. Boat traffic, floating markets, hurricane scars.
gulf_passage.character: Salt air and engine oil. Wanderer caravans meet Ghost Network skiffs at nameless ports where questions aren't asked.

breadbasket.name: The Breadbasket
breadbasket.description: Great Plains agricultural expanse. Vast fields, grain silos, scattered communities.
breadbasket.character: Endless horizons and the slow rhythm of planting seasons. Cultivator communes dot the landscape, trading with Wanderer caravans that follow ancient routes.

northern_reaches.name: The Northern Reaches
northern_reaches.description: Former Canada — harsh winters, isolated settlements, resource extraction.
northern_reaches.character: Long nights and communities bound by necessity. The Covenant holds sanctuaries here, while Ember outposts cling to survival.

pacific_corridor.name: The Pacific Corridor
pacific_corridor.description: West Coast megalopolis remnants. Tech enclaves, port cities, earthquake ruins.
pacific_corridor.character: Cracked freeways and server farms that still hum. The Convergence experiments here, while Architects sift through pre-Collapse records.

desert_sprawl.name: The Desert Sprawl
desert_sprawl.description: Southwest badlands. Abandoned suburbs, solar farms, cartel territories.
desert_sprawl.character: Sun-bleached highways and hidden canyons. Ghost Networks run escape routes through territory the Syndicate claims but can't fully control.

northeast_scar.name: The Northeast Scar
northeast_scar.description: Boston to DC corridor. Bombed infrastructure, fortified enclaves, Nexus surveillance.
northeast_scar.character: Craters and checkpoints. The Architects preserve what history remains while Nexus watchers track movement between the surviving cities.

sovereign_south.name: The Sovereign South
sovereign_south.description: Deep South religious communities. Covenant territory with Witness enclaves.
sovereign_south.character: Humid nights and communities built on faith. Witnesses keep records while the Covenant offers sanctuary to those in need.

texas_spine.name: The Texas Spine
texas_spine.description: Central Texas trade hub. Oil remnants, border towns, caravan crossroads.
texas_spine.character: Dust and deals. The Syndicate runs trade through here, butting heads with Lattice infrastructure that still carries power south.

frozen_edge.name: The Frozen Edge
frozen_edge.description: Alaska and Yukon. Extreme isolation, bunker communities, resource caches.
frozen_edge.character: The last frontier got lonelier. Ember survivors here answer to no one, preserving pre-Collapse knowledge in underground archives.

travel_notes: Travel between adjacent regions is narratively free. Distant travel may require vehicles, favors, or multiple sessions.
